featured.title: CHIP-8 Emulator
featured.description: A basic CHIP-8 interpreter written in rust, attempting to emulate the original COSMAC VIP interpreter. I also wrote a very elementary assembler in python, which I used to create test ROMs.

featured.title: Docker Dash
featured.description: Docker Dash is a handy GUI dashboard made for administrators to manage users' apps running as docker containers on a server. This is a project I worked on while interning at the Applied Research Laboratory at Univeristy of Hawai'i

other.title: Word Searcher
other.description: Brute force word search solver, made with Python
